name: Portal
description: Portal moves its container to a specific location based on target elements. Basically it uses <Teleport> in the background.

append-to.label: appendTo
append-to.title: A valid query selector or an HTMLElement to specify where the dialog gets attached. Special keywords are "body" for document body and "self" for the element itself.

disabled.label: disabled
disabled.title: If disabled, the Portal feature is eliminated and the content is displayed directly.
